content:
Panda can load JPG, PNG, TIF, and a number of other file formats.

More advanced texturing methods are described in the following sections.

simple-texturing choosing-a-texture-size texture-wrap-modes texture-filter-types simple-texture-replacement multitexture-introduction texture-modes texture-order texture-combine-modes texture-transforms multiple-texture-coordinate-sets automatic-texture-coordinates projected-textures simple-environment-mapping 3d-textures cube-maps environment-mapping-with-cube-maps automatic-texture-animation playing-mpg-and-avi-files multiview-textures transparency-and-blending texture-management texture-compression creating-textures
